claims.claim: Manual work that took hours is now available instantly
claims.quote: Thanks to the Joule copilot and Joule Agents, what once took hours of manual work is now available instantly, driving our strategies and enhancing team performance

claims.claim: Critical information is available within seconds
claims.quote: Joule helps users instantly access game statistics, player performance trends and strategic comparisons, making critical information available within seconds

claims.claim: Eliminates need for manual data retrieval
claims.quote: This shift eliminates the need for manual data retrieval, empowering diverse users to make data-driven decisions at game speed

claims.claim: Match preparation time reduced from four days to one hour
claims.quote: With SAP BTP, Milanov explained, typical preparation time for a match is down from four days to one hour

claims.claim: 1% performance improvement could mean $50 million in prize money
claims.quote: knowing that even achieving a narrow edge, improving performance by only 1%, for example, could mean an extra $50 million USD in prize money

claims.claim: Team Liquid has won more than $43 million in prize money and 120 major titles
claims.quote: Since its founding in 2000, Team Liquid has won more than $43 million in prize money and 120 major titles and counting across the 15 esports games in which it competes

claims.claim: Processing 50,000 data points per match across 20,000 games daily
claims.quote: The average esports game, we're taking 50,000 data points from each match and we're talking 20,000 games a day
